lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "As the leading worldwide supplier of of automation and controls for buildings, industry, aerospace and defense, Honeywell is now focusing its management, technical and financial resources on high market share business," Spencer said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Honeywell Bull said it will continue to develop its product line and build its business in integrated systems for networking, database management and transaction processing.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Honeywell said it will use much of the money to reduce short-term debt incurred last December when the company purchased the Sperry Aerospace Group.
